dict.acceptation: 刷子，画笔；灌木丛；小冲突；

sent.orig: If you want to customize a pen or brush, you set its color or style.
sent.trans: 如果你想自定义一个pen或者brush,你可以设置它的颜色和风格。

sent.orig: Nailbrush, household brush, cleaning brush, plastic brush etc is our major products.
sent.trans: 指甲刷、家用刷、清洁刷、塑料刷是我们的主打产品。

sent.orig: Again the shoes anyone, also scatters some laundry powder, again the brush to brush, flushes water.
sent.trans: 再把鞋弄上谁，也撒上一些洗衣粉，再用刷子刷一刷，冲一冲水。

sent.orig: Contoured brush head: Advanced contoured brush head with slim, angled neck for maneuverability.
sent.trans: 轮廓刷头：高级轮廓刷纤细，脖子上的机动性角度头。

sent.orig: Vacuum Cleaner Floor Brush, Hanger, Plastic Good, Brush, Ear Tag, Plastic Waste Plastic Products.
sent.trans: 采购产品吸尘器地板刷，衣架，塑料好，刷子，耳标记，塑胶废料，塑胶制品。
